artifacts.label: Soup Protocol Documentation
artifacts.blurb: An onchain protocol for prediction markets. This technical diagram explains the core architecture of conditional tokens and decentralized order books.

artifacts.label: FOMO App - Live Market
artifacts.blurb: A mobile prediction market interface showing live betting on Eagles vs. Chiefs. Displays real-time odds, volume, and cash-out options.

artifacts.label: Single Market View
artifacts.blurb: A focused view of a single prediction market, showing detailed information and trading interface.

artifacts.label: Receipt Detail
artifacts.blurb: A detail card showing purchase information for a specific bet, including cost, potential winnings, and position details.

artifacts.label: Clearing Co. Price Tag
artifacts.blurb: A simple price tag design for Clearing Co., representing the brand identity and pricing structure.

artifacts.blurb: A data grid showing numerical patterns and relationships, possibly representing game state or analytical data.
